title: _Begriffsschrift_ Chapter II with logical equivalence
content: Here we leverage ~ df-ifp to partition a wff into two that are disjoint with the selector wff. Thus if we are given ` |- ( ph <-> if- ( ps , ch , th ) ) ` then we replace the concept (illegal in our notation ) ` ( ph `` ps ) ` with ` if- ( ps , ch , th ) ` to reason about the values of the "function." Likewise, we replace the similarly illegal concept ` A. ps ph ` with ` ( ch /\ th ) ` .

blocks.name: axfrege52a
blocks.content: Justification for ~ ax-frege52a . (Contributed by RP, 17-Apr-2020.)

blocks.name: ax-frege52a
blocks.content: The case when the content of ` ph ` is identical with the content of ` ps ` and in which a proposition controlled by an element for which we substitute the content of ` ph ` is affirmed (in this specific case the identity logical function) and the same proposition, this time where we substituted the content of ` ps ` , is denied does not take place. Part of Axiom 52 of [Frege1879] p. 50. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege52aid
blocks.content: The case when the content of ` ph ` is identical with the content of ` ps ` and in which ` ph ` is affirmed and ` ps ` is denied does not take place. Identical to ~ biimp . Part of Axiom 52 of [Frege1879] p. 50. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege53aid
blocks.content: Specialization of ~ frege53a . Proposition 53 of [Frege1879] p. 50. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege53a
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ frege55a . Proposition 53 of [Frege1879] p. 50. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: axfrege54a
blocks.content: Justification for ~ ax-frege54a . Identical to ~ biid . (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: ax-frege54a
blocks.content: Reflexive equality of wffs. The content of ` ph ` is identical with the content of ` ph ` . Part of Axiom 54 of [Frege1879] p. 50. Identical to ~ biid . (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege54cor0a
blocks.content: Synonym for logical equivalence. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege54cor1a
blocks.content: Reflexive equality. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege55aid
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ frege57aid . Core proof of Proposition 55 of [Frege1879] p. 50. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.)

blocks.name: frege55lem1a
blocks.content: Necessary deduction regarding substitution of value in equality. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege55lem2a
blocks.content: Core proof of Proposition 55 of [Frege1879] p. 50. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege55a
blocks.content: Proposition 55 of [Frege1879] p. 50. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege55cor1a
blocks.content: Proposition 55 of [Frege1879] p. 50. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege56aid
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ frege57aid . Proposition 56 of [Frege1879] p. 50. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege56a
blocks.content: Proposition 56 of [Frege1879] p. 50. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege57aid
blocks.content: This is the all imporant formula which allows us to apply Frege-style definitions and explore their consequences. A closed form of ~ biimpri . Proposition 57 of [Frege1879] p. 51. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege57a
blocks.content: Analogue of ~ frege57aid . Proposition 57 of [Frege1879] p. 51. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: axfrege58a
blocks.content: Identical to ~ anifp . Justification for ~ ax-frege58a . (Contributed by RP, 28-Mar-2020.)

blocks.name: ax-frege58a
blocks.content: If ` A. x ph ` is affirmed, ` [ y / x ] ph ` cannot be denied. Identical to ~ stdpc4 . Axiom 58 of [Frege1879] p. 51. (Contributed by RP, 28-Mar-2020.) (New usage is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege58acor
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ frege59a . (Contributed by RP, 17-Apr-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege59a
blocks.content: A kind of Aristotelian inference. Namely Felapton or Fesapo. Proposition 59 of [Frege1879] p. 51. _Note_: in the Bauer-Meenfelberg translation published in van Heijenoort's collection _From Frege to Goedel_, this proof has the ~ frege12 incorrectly referenced where ~ frege30 is in the original. (Contributed by RP, 17-Apr-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege60a
blocks.content: Swap antecedents of ~ ax-frege58a . Proposition 60 of [Frege1879] p. 52. (Contributed by RP, 17-Apr-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege61a
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ frege65a . Proposition 61 of [Frege1879] p. 52. (Contributed by RP, 17-Apr-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege62a
blocks.content: A kind of Aristotelian inference. This judgement replaces the mode of inference ~ barbara when the minor premise has a particular context. Proposition 62 of [Frege1879] p. 52. (Contributed by RP, 17-Apr-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege63a
blocks.content: Proposition 63 of [Frege1879] p. 52. (Contributed by RP, 17-Apr-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege64a
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ frege65a . Proposition 64 of [Frege1879] p. 53. (Contributed by RP, 17-Apr-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege65a
blocks.content: A kind of Aristotelian inference. This judgement replaces the mode of inference ~ barbara when the minor premise has a general context. Proposition 65 of [Frege1879] p. 53. (Contributed by RP, 17-Apr-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege66a
blocks.content: Swap antecedents of ~ frege65a . Proposition 66 of [Frege1879] p. 54. (Contributed by RP, 17-Apr-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege67a
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ frege68a . Proposition 67 of [Frege1879] p. 54. (Contributed by RP, 17-Apr-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)

blocks.name: frege68a
blocks.content: Combination of applying a definition and applying it to a specific instance. Proposition 68 of [Frege1879] p. 54. (Contributed by RP, 17-Apr-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
